stanza.line: Let me confess that we two must be (a)twain(/a)
So shall those blots that do with me (a)remain(/a)
Without thy help by me be borne (b)alone(/b)
In our two loves there is but one (c)respect(/c)
Though in our lives a separable (d)spite(/d)
Which though it alter not love's sole (c)effect(/c)
Yet doth it steal sweet hours from love's (d)delight(/d)
Lest my bewailed guilt should do thee (f)shame(/f)
Nor thou with public kindness honour (e)me(/e)
Unless thou take that honour from thy (f)name(/f)
But do not so I love thee in such (g)sort(/g)
As thou being mine mine is thy good (g)report(/g)
